extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected PHP Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the PHP version in use is affected by the vulnerability by verifying the installed version against the affected versions list.

extracted_playbook.title: Update PHP to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Apply updates to the affected PHP versions to mitigate the vulnerability. Ensure PHP is updated to at least version 8.1.29, 8.2.20, or 8.3.8.

cve_id: PHP Vulnerability on Windows with Apache and PHP-CGI
